summary: An email from Marc A. Weinstein to Andrew Tomback regarding the Epstein Estate, containing dial-in information for a Skype for Business meeting. The document appears to be administrative correspondence related to estate matters.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein

persons.context: Appears as the recipient of an email regarding the Epstein Estate.

events.description: Marc A. Weinstein sends an email to Andrew Tomback regarding the Epstein Estate, providing dial-in information for a Skype for Business meeting.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 9, 2020, concerning the Epstein Estate.
Marc A. Weinstein is corresponding with Andrew Tomback about estate matters.
The email contains detailed dial-in information for an international Skype for Business meeting.
The correspondence suggests ongoing administrative or legal proceedings related to Jeffrey Epstein's estate in late 2020.
